means: 心肠软的，心地温和的，温厚的

sentence.Network_en: She was a tenderhearted creature, who sympathized with everyone.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是一个软心肠的人, 对任何人都同情.

sentence.Network_en: A noble tenderhearted creature who sympathizes with all the human race.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个高贵、心地善良的人,他对所有的人种抱有同情心.

entry.tran: 心肠软的;温柔善良的;体贴的
entry.def: If you are tender-hearted, you have a gentle and caring nature.

sentences.sentence: "a noble tenderhearted creature who sympathizes with all the human race"- W.M.Thackeray
